description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you work out the phrase in order to save your avatar?  Full version features include: 1000 phrases in 5 varied categories, access to your statistics and a system to avoid repetition of phrases.  Includes support for the XBOX 360 Chatpad or USB Keyboard, and a variety of color schemes.
